hook.text: Words say you're talented. A portfolio proves it. Proof beats promises every time.

buildup.text: Designers, writers, and developers have always shown work. Now every profession can too.

discovery.text: Case studies, project writeups, and before/after results serve as evidence of your capabilities.

twist.text: You don't need a fancy website. A well-organized Notion page or PDF works just as well.

climax.text: The key is curation: three great examples beat twenty mediocre ones.

punchline.text: Don't just tell them what you do. Show them what you've done.

quiz.question: What makes a strong professional portfolio?
options: A few curated examples with clear results
